alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 4:10PM MDT until August 08 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Elbert County in east central Colorado... Central Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 410 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Matheson, or 12 miles southwest of Limon, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Elbert and central Lincoln Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
